incidents.title: Degraded mail sending performance
incidents.impact: Some outbound emails were delayed for a subset of workspaces.

timeline.message: We detected increased latency from our email infrastructure provider and began investigating.
We throttled new campaign launches and worked with the provider to stabilize delivery.
Delivery performance returned to normal levels and we re-enabled normal campaign scheduling.

incidents.nextSteps: We are improving our alerting and safeguards to pause high-volume sends sooner when latency spikes.

incidents.title: Short outage of Ori-OS Web App
incidents.impact: The Ori-OS web app was unavailable for some users for several minutes.

timeline.message: A misconfiguration during a routine deployment caused a restart loop for a small subset of application instances.
We rolled back the change and restored normal operation.
We updated our deployment process to include an additional health check before rollout.

incidents.nextSteps: We continue to refine our deployment pipeline to reduce the risk of similar interruptions.
